overview: Eve is a military robot made to look exactly like her creator, Dr. Eve Simmons. When she is damaged during a bank robbery, the robot becomes an unstoppable killing machine. Colonel Jim McQuade is assigned to stop the robot and with the help from Dr. Simmons they have to predict where she will go next.
tagline: They gave her looks. Brains. Nuclear capabilities. Everything but an "off" switch.
cast: Gregory Hines|Renée Soutendijk|Michael Greene|Kurt Fuller|John M. Jackson
